LightningComponentBundle.description: Visual display of current process path.

property.name: displayName
property.label: Display Name
property.description: Use this field to populate a label affixed on the top of your progress bar

property.name: currentNumber
property.label: Current Percentage of Completion
property.description: The value that you enter here will populate the progress bar with the appropriate level of completion. IE - If you enter 50 the progress bar will fill in to 50%
